bio: Hey there, welcome to my personal site!
I'm Kenneth Sun, a student, tinkerer, musician, and writer. Not everyhing fits in a resume, and this site aims to fill in some of those gaps.
I built this site mostly from scratch with Vue/Nuxt. The source code, as well as the site itself, are both hosted on Github (Github pages).
Nothing is ever perfect. If you find a bug, have suggestions, or just want to talk, feel free to contact me.

hobbies.name: programming
hobbies.desc: Both a pleasure and a pain, always. Nothing but hands-on learning for this.

hobbies.name: writing
hobbies.desc: Writing is a great way to express ideas, bothh to other people and to myself. Maybe this site will have a blog section one day.

hobbies.name: music
hobbies.desc: I sing too much, waayyy too much. And I practice the piano way too little.
